abstract: Dr. Timothy R. Kuklo, who was accused of lying about bone-growth research, would have to be called back to active duty to face such a trial.
snippet: Dr. Timothy R. Kuklo, who was accused of lying about bone-growth research, would have to be called back to active duty to face such a trial.
lead_paragraph: The former military surgeon and Medtronic consultant accused of falsifying research about the benefits of a bone-growth product used on soldiers injured in Iraq is now under investigation for a possible court-martial, officials at the Walter Reed Army Medical Center said Wednesday.

headline.main: Inquiry Could Lead to Court-Martial for Ex-Army Surgeon
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Could Lead to Court-Martial for Ex-Army Surgeon
